params.text: Baiskeli ya Chaku
Chaku alipenda kucheza na marafiki zake.
Aliipenda baiskeli ya Lila yenye matairi matatu.
Chaku aliamua kutengeneza baiskeli yake mwenyewe ya matairi matatu.
Chaku alitafuta magogo.
Chaku alikumbuka kwamba pia alihitaji kuwa na misumari na nyundo.
Chaku alienda kwa mjomba wake kuomba msaada.
Mjomba wake Chaku alimpa vifaa. Mjomba alimwambia Chaku awe mwangalifu.
Chaku alifikiria namna ambavyo angetengeneza baiskeli yake ya matairi matatu.
Chaku akaanza kuitengeneza.
Baiskeli ya matairi mitatu ni nzuri sana! Lakini haikuwa imara.
Lila alimuona Chaku akiwa na tatizo. Akaamua kumsaidia.
Pamoja, wakatengeneza baiskeli ya matairi matatu imara.
Chaku aliendesha baiskeli yake ya matairi matatu popote alipokwenda.
Lakini alipenda zaidi wakati yeye na Lila walipoendesha baiskeli zao pamoja.

“Baiskeli ya Chaku” credits
This work, “Baiskeli ya Chaku” is a derivative of Chaku's Cycleis translated byAlisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Some rights reserved. Released under CC BY 4.0 license.Based on Original story:'Baiskeli ya Chaku', byUpendo Maria. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.
